title: Virginia League RPPC and cabinet photos Wanted!
author: noelbrian55

posts.post_title: Virginia League RPPC and cabinet photos Wanted!
posts.post_content:
I’m always on the lookout for Virginia baseball team cabinet photos and postcards from the early 1900’s and late 1800’s.  Any leads very much appreciated!

Richmond
Roanoke
Lynchburg
Danville
Norfolk
Portsmouth
Petersburg
Still seeking Virginia League cards, cabinets and postcards.
